QuestData.Title: Flames Of The Earth
QuestData.Description: I've searched the depths of the earth and found the means to break the spells that hold my people captive, but it only functions to free one who is completely bound. I would be unable to prevent myself from becoming bound by the same magic.$b$bYou, flesh creature, are not of the flames below so their binding spells should not affect you.$b$bPlease take my jewel, use its power to free my people!
QuestData.LogDescription: Molthron within the Bloodmaul Territory wants you to use the Flamewrought Jewel to free $1oa Magma Elementals.
